Description: Fields with omitempty tag excluded if zero/empty values
Agent Implication: Agents must handle missing fields gracefully

Description: Individual resource endpoints return 404 for missing items
Agent Implication: Agents should check status codes before processing

Description: Search always returns array even when empty
Agent Implication: Agents can safely iterate results without null checks

Description: All IDs auto-generated with type prefix and timestamp
Agent Implication: Agents cannot predict IDs - must use returned values

Description: Relationship queries work in both directions
Agent Implication: Agents can traverse graph in any direction

Description: Path finding has configurable depth limits
Agent Implication: Agents should set appropriate depth for performance
Agents should paginate for large datasets

Description: Required fields must be provided in requests
Agent Implication: Agents must validate input before sending
Example: name field required for concept creation

Description: Some fields have specific allowed values
Agent Implication: Agents should use valid status values
